channel.title: 317 Model Skin Types and Vertex Weights
channel.description:
I've been making my own program to load the 317 era NPC models and animations and it works perfectly except some of the vertex skin types are below zero and won't move for some reason. Can anyone explain why this happens and how to fix it?
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u662eE4e9DU]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u662eE4e9DU[/url]
As you can see the knees don't move properly as the vertex skin types are -1
